sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"热心的，热诚的"之意。
means: enthusiastic ： 指对参与某项活动或对感兴趣的计划或决定表现出的毫无保留的热切心情。
intent ： 指集中精力从事正在进行的活动，也可指专心寻求自己感兴趣的东西。
zealous ： 指对所从事的事表现出的高度热情和积极性。

sentence.Network_en: He was a recent Catholic convert, and very zealous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他最近才皈依天主教，是一名狂热的信徒。

sentence.Network_en: She was a zealous worker for charitable bodies.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对慈善事业充满热忱。

sentence.Network_en: She made zealous efforts to clean up the classroom.
sentence.Network_cn: 她非常热心地努力清扫教室.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... victorious 胜利的 zealous 热心的，热情的 famous 著名的.
幸村精市_百度百科 ... Yearning 向往的 Zealous 热情的（zealous） Justifiable- -----无可非议的.
高桥凉介 - 搜搜百科 ... Yesterday 昨天 Zealous 狂热的（zealous） 4.1Ambition 野心.
【精品】吴耀武近义词辨析 - 豆丁网 ... disable a. 使残废，使无能 226. zealous a. 热心的，热诚的 jealous a. 嫉妒的 227.

list.abs: ...相对的生物去除多一些，而且新系列（阿拉若重生）的『狂热压迫』（Zealous Persecution）是很强的低费瞬间扫台咒语，可说是 …
He is a zealous supporter of our cause ., 他是我们事业的热心支持者.
tourists and photographers have been told by zealous policemen citing section 44 and other , newer , powers stop taking pictures of famous buildings .被狂热的警察引用44条款以及其它更新的条令制止游客和摄影师拍摄著名建筑物的照片。
a zealous disciple expressed a to teach others the Truth and asked the Master what he thought about this . the Master said , " Wait " .一个热心的门徒表示自己很想教授别人真理，于是他去询问主对此的看法。主说：“等待。”

means.word_mean: 热切的,热情的,热烈的,有力的,坚决的,虔诚的

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from a medieval Latin derivative of Latin zelus 'zeal, jealousy'

entry.tran: （尤指对政治或宗教理想）热情的，充满激情的，狂热的
entry.def: Someone who is zealous spends a lot of time or energy in supporting something that they believe in very strongly, especially a political or religious ideal.

example.ex: She was a zealous worker for charitable bodies...
example.tran: 她对慈善事业充满热忱。

example.ex: He was a recent Catholic convert, and very zealous.
example.tran: 他最近才皈依天主教，是一名狂热的信徒。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by active interest and enthusiasm;

auth_sentence.content: The House of Commons...more zealous for royalty than the king.
auth_sentence.res_content: The House of Commons...more zealous for royalty than the king.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The House of Commons...more zealous for royalty than the king.

auth_sentence.content: Zealous policing has not been seen as legally problematic in England.
auth_sentence.res_content: Zealous policing has not been seen as legally problematic in England.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zealous policing has not been seen as legally problematic in England.

auth_sentence.content: Zealous anti-nuclear lobbyists and a mal-informed government have created the pending energy crisis.
auth_sentence.res_content: Zealous anti-nuclear lobbyists and a mal-informed government have created the pending energy crisis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zealous anti-nuclear lobbyists and a mal-informed government have created the pending energy crisis.

stems_affixes.word_buile: jeal=zeal热心+ous……的→对什么表示热心而无法得到,从而嫉妒
zeal热心+ous表形容词→adj.热心的,热情的
zeal热心+ot人→n.狂热分子,热心者

means.word_mean: 热心的, 热忱的, 热情的

sentences.en: He is ticketed as a zealous reformer.
sentences.cn: 他被描述成一个热心的改革家。

sentences.en: She is a zealous supporter of our cause.
sentences.cn: 她是我们事业的热心支持者。

sentences.en: She was most zealous in performing her duties.
